about_the_game:
Advent 5 Book

This Advent-themed book unlocks 24 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! It's the holiday season again! Celebrate with Coloring Pixels.

Play during the month of December to get the full Advent experience! 1 image will unlock every day between the 1st and the 24th like a true Advent calendar!

Contents

The Advent 5 book unlocks the following images:
  • Day 1: Snowflake - 51x61
  • Day 2: Sweet Mince Pie - 85x47
  • Day 3: Santa's Lunch Break - 110x130
  • Day 4: Ice Lake - 78x108
  • Day 5: Sneaky Cat - 83x70
  • Day 6: Present - 64x70
  • Day 7: Bauble - 27x33
  • Day 8: Wreath - 82x82
  • Day 9: Gingerbread - 46x72
  • Day 10: Candy Cane - 44x55
  • Day 11: Winter Forest - 150x95
  • Day 12: Polar Teddy Bear - 52x77
  • Day 13: Advent - 180x214
  • Day 14: Milk and Cookies - 54x53
  • Day 15: Penguin Pattern - 109x110
  • Day 16: Winter Park - 113x100
  • Day 17: Yule Log - 67x48
  • Day 18: Decorations - 150x100
  • Day 19: Krampus - 53x77
  • Day 20: Aussie Christmas - 160x100
  • Day 21: Christmas Morning - 127x121
  • Day 22: Christmas Tree - 76x94
  • Day 23: Christmas Clothes - 98x32
  • Day 24: Christmas Eve - 134x184

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Advent 5 Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
